tweet.text: In June 1959, Queen Elizabeth and President Eisenhower met in Montreal to open the St. Lawrence Seaway, creating easier ocean-going shipping access to the Great Lakes: https://t.co/SWITSlAWM8 📷 @IkeLibrary (NARA ID: 12009432) https://t.co/xtgqF2RjGr
